channel.title: General on Thoughts from Anala

item.title: On starting a blog
item.description: Having a blog as a way to learn new technical skills and build my personal brand was something I wanted to attempt. Therefore, I spent a weekend building this static website that could host simple markdown documents or HTML outputs. Although I have some familiarity with using Jekyll as a static site generator with GitHub Pages, I preferred the default aesthetics of Hugo with the Casper theme. I started following the Quick Start guide for building and deploying Hugo as a GitHub Pages website.
